mapper.insert: insert into reservation(code, accommodation_id, account_id, visitors, start_date, end_date, price) values (#{code}, #{accommodationId}, #{accountId}, #{visitors}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, a.name, a.description, a.address, ai.uri AS image_uri FROM reservation r JOIN accommodation a ON r.accommodation_id = a.id LEFT JOIN accommodation_image ai ON ai.id = ( SELECT MIN(id) FROM accommodation_image WHERE accommodation_id = a.id ) WHERE r.account_id = #{accountId} order by r.end_date desc;
select count(*) as cnt from reservation_date where accommodation_id=#{accommodationId} and date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
mapper.delete: delete from reservation_date where accommodation_id=#{accommodationId} and date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
mapper.update: update reservation set visitors=#{visitors}, start_date=#{startDate}, end_date=#{endDate}, price=#{price} where code=#{code}
